ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CloseDate >= DATE(2020,3,9), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), OR( AND( ISCHANGED(New_MRR__c), NOT(ISBLANK(New_MRR__c)), NOT(ROUND(New_MRR__c, 2) = ROUND(MRR_from_Products__c, 2))), NOT(ISBLANK(Contraction__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Renewal__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Churn__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Internal_Transfer__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Churn_Platform_churn__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(New_MRR_Platform_transfer__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For new business opps, only the New MRR or New MRR: Platform Transfer fields should be filled and it should match MRR from products.
